alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 4:27AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BANDS OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW SHIFTING EAST ACROSS INL, THE UPPER SNAKE RIVER PLAIN, AND TETON VALLEY THROUGH 7 AM MST... At 418 AM MST, bands of light to moderate snow were tracking east across INL and the Upper Snake River Plain toward Blackfoot, Idaho Falls, and the Teton Valley. Motorists traveling north on Interstate 15 through Blackfoot, Idaho Falls, and Dubois and along Highway 20 toward Ashton and 33 east to Driggs should be prepared for difficult driving conditions this morning with accumulating snow and significantly reduced visibility at times. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Blackfoot, Rigby, Driggs, Ashton, Dubois, Felt, Ririe Reservoir, Goshen, Terreton, Marysville, Lorenzo, Ammon, Shelley, Victor, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon and Menan. The snow can accumulate at a rate of one inch per hour or more in this area of heavy snow. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this area of heavy snow.
